casebody.data:
ZALIAGIRIS
v.
ZALIAGIRIS. No. 332A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 14, 2005. G. Russell Kornegay, III, Preston O. Odom, III, Charlotte, for Elizabeth Smith Zaliagiris. Kary C. Watson, Charlotte, for Thomas E. Zaliagiris.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of October 2005 by Tate K. Sterrett and the law firm of Horack, Talley, Pharr and Lowndes, P.A. to Withdraw as attorney of record:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 14th day of October 2005."
